name: SLING
description:
Release Date : August 8th 2018

As a 2D platformer i wanted to try something different features:

  • Movement: Players will control both the main character with the basic "AD" input and also the spirit companion with the mouse, instead of jumping players will be able to teleport the main character to their spirit companion with the "Space" key
  • Resource Management: Teleporting drains your companion so choose wisely when to teleport. You can refill energy by acquiring drops around the map or by destroying unfamiliars.
  • Penalties: Since you'll be playing as a ghost you can't die, however coming into contact with enemies will drain your energy leaving incapable of moving and so the only way to go around that would be to restart, which could be just as annoying as seeing a death screen.
  • Levers and interactive walls

This is my first actual game and will continue to further develop it and am extremely keen on what feedback or suggestions you may have for me, if you would like to contact me directly my email is jasonny8899@gmail.com
